programmes.show_description: While Lucy Kennedy spends the weekend with media personality Gemma Collins, Kennedy works in Collins's shop and shares a meal with Gemma's family.
Randall keeps Professor Dawson in Beirut in wait for the paymasters' instructions; a suspicious US general asks a CIA contact to spy on Dalby; Colonel Stok makes an offer to Dalby.

Comment and analysis on the big stories of the day in Ireland and abroad with a panel of guests covering the key issues.
Some of the top celebrities across Ireland are interviewed while the hosts feature knowledgeable advice on topics that cover multiple topics and industries.
Ireland AM is the longest running daytime show in Ireland. Blending a mixture of lifestyle interviews and news content, with gardening, health, food and fashion seven days a week.
A mix of celebrity interviews, entertainment news, current affairs discussions, a look at sports competitions, health columns, cooking tips and tricks, and more.
The latest national and international news stories from the Virgin Media News team, followed by sport and weather.
All that stands between Stan from Derby, Joe from Newcastle, Prathi from Shifnal, and June from Stevenage and thousands of pounds is one of the country's finest quiz brains. Can they work tog
Huge global hit game show The Chase is the ultimate heart-racing, high-pressure quiz.
A rotating panel of four female figures from the worlds of journalism and entertainment talk about various issues of importance though a woman's perspective.
A follow-up meeting with a Jack Russell Terrier and the now-four-week-old mixed Staffie puppies he met earlier on the show.
Judge Judy presides over her courtroom with wit and wisdom.

The latest national and international news stories from the Virgin Media News team.

The latest national and international news stories from the Virgin Media News team.
It's Christmas time and Monica tries tipping with cookies, rather than cash, with mixed results; Phoebe tries to track down her real father.
Sarah urges Cain to listen. Bear is determined. Joe encourages Graham.
Will and Sam attempt to keep each other onside, Carl reports Ronnie for assault, Brian refuses to reinstate Lily, and Tim gets jealous of Ben and Steves blossoming friendship.
When a terrorist campaign threatens the capital over the summer, bomb disposal experts Lana Washington and Joel Nutkins are at the forefront of urgent efforts.
Bruno must get to the centre of a victim's incomplete story to track down a rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to happen.
When the town of Waterside is hit with the largest flood in its history, the community pulls together to keep everyone safe.
Two different families trade homes with each other and figure out if they can get a better handle on dealing with their own messy homes by living in another's.
Dalby sends Harry and Jean to investigate the Pacific atoll where the neutron bomb is going to be tested; Harry meets a psychiatrist that worked with the murdered Radley.

Monica gets together with Fun Bobby, but discovers that when he's not drinking, he's not so fun; Joey wins the role of Dr. Drake Ramoray on 'Days of Our Lives.'
Marlon is furious. Paddy is determined to help his dad. Kammy and Ross match-make.
Sam checks his phone for evidence of Megan and Wills affair, Debbie vows to make amends to Carl, and Jodie stirs up trouble at The Kabin.
When a brutally beaten corpse is found in a disused quarry, Cooper and Fry's investigations prompt pursuit by a mysterious group and bring forth secrets laid to rest long ago.
After the body of a photographer is found dead lying among an ancient stone circle at a tourist spot, Cooper and Fry are drawn in to a mystery that sends shockwaves through the team.
Narrated by Rory Cowan, this observational series sees Ireland's opinionated TV viewers commenting freely on the best and worst TV shows of the past week.
